column4: shouldn't be the case but some apps are not nice and can block the sound card ... make sure all your apps use pulseaudio or esd as sound option
where can I configure that in Rhythmbox and in VLC Player?
Rythmbox should use it by default in vlc player is Preferences>Audio>Output modules (make sure Advanced options is checked)
also make sure you have vlc-plugin-pulse instaled
for rhythmbox and many other gstreamer apps check "gstreamer-properties" (run it)

i choose "Pulseaudio audio output" from the drop down menu that appears when you check the Advanced options
